name: Business Calendar
body:
# Business Calendar

Business Calendar is a Java package adding business time management to Java8.
Main functionality is to get the elapsed time between two dates for a given business calendar.

This package also provides an object to load business calendar configuration from a configuration file (including typical week and holidays).

Build on Maven, may come soon to Maven repo.

Done during my intern at Capgemini.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
